bibl.title: [Funeral invitation] 1845 Jun. 9, Nashville [Tennessee], Invitation to the funeral of Andrew Jackson
bibl.note: This document is an invitation to the funeral of Andrew Jackson presented on June 9, 1845. Jackson died the evening before, June 8, and the funeral service will take place on the following day, June 10.

Rev. Dr. Reverend Doctor Robert B. C. Howell,
Jany January 3, 1859 THE friends and acquaintance of
GEN. General ANDREW JACKSON are invited to attend his Funeral at the Hermitage, on to-morrow (Tuesday) morning at 11 o'clock.

hand with pointed finger Divine service by the
Rev. Dr. Reverend Doctor Edgar. His death took place last evening at 6 o'clock. Nashville, Monday, June 9, 1845.
